
h1. Layout Configuration

eXo Address Book layout allows you to show or hide many parts of the Contact interface. Following simple guides to configure the layout:

On the main tool bar, click the *Layout* icon and then select an item in the drop down list menu:


!images/LayoutMenu.png!


If you select the *Left Pane* item in the drop down list menu, the navigation pane in the left area is hidden:


!images/HideLeftpanel.png!
